page.title: 04ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: {Grimoldby, Lincolnshire {Arts and Crafts Numerous arts and crafts are practised in the area. These include Copper Repouse, which forms a raised pattern used for pictures and fire screens - soft toy making - knitting - crotchet -oil and water colour painting - canvas work - jewellery making - patchwork padded boxes - children's wooden toys - corn dollies - dress making and flower arrangements. The Women's Institute hold classes to teach most of the above crafts and individual members pass on their skills to others.
